lessons.japanese: その火山は周期的に噴火を繰り返す。
lessons.indonesian: The volcano erupts at regular intervals.

lessons.japanese: 月経周期は約４週間です。
lessons.indonesian: My menstrual cycle is about every four weeks.

lessons.japanese: その活火山は周期的に噴火する。
lessons.indonesian: The active volcano erupts at regular intervals.
